content: this textured scarf pattern uses the bean stitch to create a wonderfully textured yet easy-to-make scarf a video tutorial for this pattern is available on my youtube channel youtube channel indigo bean crochet scarf pattern tutorial 1 materials needed 500 yards of a #4 medium-weight yarn yarn used lion brand s ferris wheel in the color full moon 5 00 h-8 mm crochet hook yarn needle scissors stitch markers optional > subscribe to my newsletter 2 to be notified when new patterns come out 1 https //youtu be/kbnf4u-63pq 2 https //subscribepage io/mfhzxe
